title: Snow and the Seventh Wolf
description: Exiled for attempting to kill his sister's lover, the last thing Seth needs is to be saddled with a human. But Seth can't turn his back when he discovers Snow fleeing from her avaricious step-parents murder plot. Isolated in a cabin in the woods, Snow attempts seduction and Seth discovers even werewolves are vulnerable to passion's temptation. Seth's angry struggles against his desire drive him away, but his over-protective alpha nature won't let him abandon a female in distress. With Snow in danger again, can Seth overcome his prejudices in time to save Snow from her step-parents evil plan?
author: Jessica Aspen
